alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 1:02AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lauderdale, Colbert and northwestern Franklin Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 102 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Olive Hill to near Blue Mountain. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Red Bay, Killen, Cherokee, Lexington, St. Florian and Underwood-Petersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
